name: Jump Hero
overview: A vertical scrolling platformer where you must jump to the top of each stage while avoiding hazards as quickly as possible. The player can choose to aim for the summit as Billy, who excels in jump and movement speed, or as Ivan, who can not be caught in traps and has the ability to fly. There are three different modes, normal, map select and training and also a ranking system that keeps track of the finishing time of every stage.
